meanings.definition: Items that are considered valuable or desirable to collect.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother has a shelf full of collectibles, including antique dolls and rare coins.
meanings.sent2: People often enjoy searching for collectibles at flea markets and antique shops.
meanings.sent3: The collectibles on the shelf started talking to each other when no one was looking!
meanings.sent4: Her collection of collectibles was a treasure trove of memories and stories.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight danced off the glass figurines, making the collectibles sparkle like jewels.

meanings.definition: The act of gathering or amassing a collection of items.
meanings.sent1: His hobby of collectibles brought him joy as he added new pieces to his collection.
meanings.sent2: Collecting stamps and coins is a popular form of collectibles for many people.
meanings.sent3: The collectibles seemed to multiply on their own, as if they had a secret plan.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for collectibles was like a magnet, drawing her to antique stores every weekend.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the buzz of excitement as the auction for rare collectibles began.
